今日も楽しげな クラスメート 見送って\r\n: Today I look after my classmates having a good time
いつもの道 たどってる 夕暮れ前\r\n: As I walk along my usual path before dusk
街路樹の影と 薄い空と 冷えた風\r\n: The shadows of street trees, faint skies, and cold winds
家路たどる 人の波 街の灯り\r\n: Waves of people traveling their way back home, the town lights
結んだ髪 指で解いて\r\n: Untying my hair with my fingers
私だけの 時間が来る\r\n: I'll have time just for myself
子供の頃に 読み続けた\r\n: I kept reading stories of other worlds
この胸にも 描いている そう 星座のように\r\n: I've drawn them on my heart like constellations
空の彼方 叫びたいよ ああ 全ての気持ち\r\n: Beyond the sky, I want to scream, ah, with all of my emotions
丘の向こう しんとした空の縁 そっと開いた窓越し\r\n: Beyond the hills, at the silent empty sky, through the quietly opened window
数億年の光を見てる\r\n: I see hundreds of millions of years of light
意味もわからず ただ心に\r\n: I don't know what this means, but these emotions
形にして 声に出して ああ\r\n: They take shape, raising my voice, ah
歌にしたい\r\n: I want to make them into a song
